content: charisma chunky earwarmer a crochet pattern by cascadefiberworks all of my socials can be found here please tag me and #charismachunkyearwarmer if you don t post i d still love to see your creation you can sell what you make with the pattern you may not redistribute my pattern in any way if you want to share my pattern please use the ravelry/blog url ch2 does not count as a stitch ch1 does not count as a stitch to use a different sized yarn/hook use a multiple of three plus two 3x+2 chains and make to fit considering the stretch and head size bobble- yarn over insert into st and pull through a loop y/o and insert into same st and pull through a loop yarn over and insert into same stand pull through a loop yarn over and pull through all loops on the hook to recreate the color placements the first and last four row should be a different color you ll need l hook 8mm charisma yarn/weight 5 bulky yarn needle scissors chain 11 in the back bumps of the chain starting in the second chain from hook 1 single_crochet 10 turn 2 ch1 single_crochet 10 turn 3 ch2 double_crochet in the first st *skip over next st double_crochet in next bobble in the skipped st double_crochet in next available st repeat until end 10 turn repeat 2-3 until it s long enough considering the stretch of the project then move into last 2 row 28-29 repeat row2 fold ends like two interlocking c s see picture sew in ends charisma chunky earwarmer a crochet pattern by cascadefiberworks
